NewsArticle.Title: UnknownPlayer.com chat
NewsArticle.Content:
Hot on the heels of the Planet DA chat and the announcement of the expansion, The DA Team will be participating in a chat at UnknownPlayer.com. Have questions about the exciting changes coming to Dark Ages, or questions we did not answer about Dark Ages last night? Do not miss your chance to ask!
Chat Details: Server: Irc.Sorcery.Net Room: #up.com Time: 4:00 PM Pacific, 5:00 PM Mountain, 6:00 PM Central, 7:00 Eastern Date: Wednesday 11/27/02
